title: In the classroom (TEFC)
creator_credit: James M. Smith, MHC Films and Davidson Films
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Specific learning disabilities”.
Defines and documents the most common types of specific learning disabilities. Presents a language learning hierarchy, illustrated by film footage, to show how and why learning disabilities impair academic development and discusses resources outside of the school which can offer evaluative and remedial help.
creator_credit_for_label: James M. Smith, MHC Films and Davidson Films
